column2: Still mobile, coherent, quick reflexes; ulcerated, small tumor
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumors
Tumor was extremely small--located on the right side of the head, however, it was severly ulcerated.
Heart and lungs had a cluster of mets on the anterior surface of lungs upon visual inspection
1 cryogenic tube of tumor tissue was frozen down.
